Reliable and affordable hosting services since 2006, from our in house Datacenter located in New Jersey, USA. We make sure our clients have the best quality service, offering 24/7 Customer Care support and 99.99% guranteed uptime, so your site will always be up.

We offer a variety of dedicated server options to suit the needs of clients of all types and sizes. 

Take advantage of our special offer! To see all Dedicated Deals click [HERE](http://domainsatcost.com/server-hosting/sale.php) 

**Dedicated Deal 1:**
*Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.00 Ghz
*250 GB Hard Drive
*4 GB Memory
*4 Dedicated IPV4 Ip's /30 Subnet
*Unmetered Redundant Bandwidth
*Linux/Windows OS
*Expedited Free Setup
*OPTIONAL White Label Solution
**Monthly Price = only for $44.99/mo**


Features included:
*DDoS Protection
-Expedited Free Setup
-In-House Data Center Locations
-24x7 Live Support (English and Spanish)
-99.99% Uptime Guarantee

No Setup or hidden Fees, No contract necessary and Free Migration. 

For further information visit: http://domainsatcost.com/
